verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>,

To Timothy <S%G5095><s%>, my dearly beloved <S%G27><s%> son <S%G5043><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%>, mercy <S%G1656><s%>, and peace <S%G1515><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

I thank <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5485><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> I serve <S%G3000><s%> from <S%G575><s%> my forefathers <S%G4269><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> pure <S%G2513><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>, that <S%G5613><s%> without ceasing <S%G88><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> remembrance <S%G3417><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> prayers <S%G1162><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>;

Greatly desiring <S%G1971><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, being mindful <S%G3415><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> tears <S%G1144><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may be filled <S%G4137><s%> with joy <S%G5479><s%>; Greatly: or, remembering thy tears, I greatly desire to see thee that

When I call <S%G2983><s%> to remembrance <S%G5280><s%> the unfeigned <S%G505><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> dwelt <S%G1774><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> grandmother <S%G3125><s%> Lois <S%G3090><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> Eunice <S%G2131><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> I am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G156><s%> I put <S%G363><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> in remembrance <S%G363><s%> that thou stir up <S%G329><s%> the gift <S%G5486><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the putting on <S%G1936><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath <S%G1325><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of fear <S%G1167><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> of power <S%G1411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of love <S%G26><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of a sound mind <S%G4995><s%>.

Be <S%G1870><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> thou <S%G1870><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>, nor <S%G3366><s%> of me <S%G1691><s%> his <S%G846><s%> prisoner <S%G1198><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> be thou partaker of the afflictions <S%G4777><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>;

Who <S%G3588><s%> hath saved <S%G4982><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> us with an holy <S%G40><s%> calling <S%G2821><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> purpose <S%G4286><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the world began <S%G5550><s%> <S%G166><s%>,

But <S%G1161><s%> is <S%G5319><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> made manifest <S%G5319><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the appearing <S%G2015><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, who <S%G3303><s%> hath abolished <S%G2673><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> hath brought <S%G5461><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immortality <S%G861><s%> to light <S%G5461><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%>:

Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am appointed <S%G5087><s%> a preacher <S%G2783><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>.

For <S%G1223><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> I <S%G3958><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>: nevertheless <S%G235><s%> I am <S%G1870><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have believed <S%G4100><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> able <S%G1415><s%> to keep <S%G5442><s%> that which I <S%G3450><s%> have committed unto him <S%G3866><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>. believed: or, trusted

Hold fast <S%G2192><s%> the form <S%G5296><s%> of sound <S%G5198><s%> words <S%G3056><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> thou hast heard <S%G191><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

That good thing <S%G2570><s%> which was committed unto thee <S%G3872><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> dwelleth <S%G1774><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>.

This <S%G5124><s%> thou knowest <S%G1492><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> they which are in <S%G1722><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> be turned away from <S%G654><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>; of whom <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> Phygellus <S%G5436><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Hermogenes <S%G2061><s%>.

The Lord <S%G2962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> unto the house <S%G3624><s%> of Onesiphorus <S%G3683><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G404><s%> oft <S%G4178><s%> refreshed <S%G404><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G1870><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> chain <S%G254><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%>, when he was <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%>, he sought <S%G2212><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> out <S%G2212><s%> very diligently <S%G4706><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> me.

The Lord <S%G2962><s%> grant <S%G1325><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> that he may find <S%G2147><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> in how many things <S%G3745><s%> he ministered unto me <S%G1247><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>, thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1097><s%> very well <S%G957><s%>.
